item.title: Eddington First Image: Joaquin Phoenix & Pedro Pascal Get Confrontational In Ari Aster's New A24 Movie
item.description: The first image from Eddington reveals Joaquin Phoenix and Pedro Pascal getting confrontational in Ari Aster's new A24 movie premiering at Cannes.

item.title: Revenge Of The Sith's "Intense" Lightsaber Training Revealed By Samuel L. Jackson
item.description: The lightsaber duels in the prequel trilogy are widely beloved, and it's all thanks to the training Samuel L. Jackson and others went through.
